price: He will say, “My Lord, why have you raised me blind when I was able to see before?”
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَنِيٓ أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَدۡ كُنتُ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
